The name of the speaker. "SYSTEM" for System.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.ReadSingle
member.summary: Returns the object at the tail of the buffer and advances the read position by 1.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.Read(System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Returns an array containing the number of objects requested, and advances the tail of the buffer.
member.param: Number of objects to get from the tail of the buffer.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.AdvanceTail(System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Advances the tail of the buffer, returns nothing, effectively skipping the specified number of objects.
member.param: The amount by which to advance.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.WriteSingle(`0@)
member.summary: Writes a single object to the buffer, then advances the head position by 1.
member.param: The object to insert into the buffer.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.Write(`0[]@)
member.summary: Writes the array of objects to the buffer and advances the head position by that number of objects.
member.param: An array of the objects to write to the buffer.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.Clear
member.summary: Empties the buffer.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.PeekMultiple(System.UInt32@,System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Returns the specified number of objects as the desired position, but does NOT advance the tail position.
member.param: The number of objects to retreive
The position to start reading from.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.Peek(System.UInt32@)
member.summary: Returns the object as the given postion, but does NOT advance the tail position.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.Size
member.summary: The total number of objects current held in the buffer. (not the actual buffer size)

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.RealSize
member.summary: Return the true size of the circular buffer, not just how much it actualy contains.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.TailPosition
member.summary: The offset of the tail from the true beginning of the buffer.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.HeadPosition
member.summary: The offset of the head from the true beginning of the buffer.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1.ToArray
member.summary: Copies the entire buffer to an array and returns the array, does NOT move the head or tail position.

member.name: T:UOLite2.LiteClient.CircularBuffer`1
member.summary: A highly efficient FIFO buffer class.
member.typeparam: The Type of objects you want to make a circular buff of.

member.name: T:UOLite2.LiteClient.Enums.GetItemFailedReason
member.summary: Reason enumeration for "Get Item Failed" packet. (0x27)

member.name: T:UOLite2.LiteClient.Enums.PacketType
member.summary: Packet type enumeration.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.#ctor
member.summary: When using this new, never ever ever try to access the contents!

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Serial
member.summary: The serial of the item.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Type
member.summary: The artwork number of that item. This is what determines what it looks like in game.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.StackID
member.summary: The number to add the the artwork number to get the artwork number of the item if it is a stack. Usualy this is 0x01.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Amount
member.summary: The number of objects in a stack.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.X
member.summary: The location of the item on the X axis. If the item is inside of a container, this represents the number of pixels within the container from the left side at which the item will be placed.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Y
member.summary: The location of the item on the Y axis. If the item is inside of a container, this represents the number of pixels from the top of the container that the item will be placed

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Z
member.summary: The location of the item on the Z axis. If the item is inside of a container this specifies the "height" of it, like if its on top of other objects.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Container
member.summary: The serial of the container of the item.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Hue
member.summary: The item's hue.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.TypeName
member.summary: Returns a string containing the ASCII name of the item artwork name. Returns "Blank" if no typename can be found.

member.name: P:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Tag
member.summary: A user defined string for making notes on items and mobiles.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Take(System.UInt16)
member.summary: Picks up the object.
member.param: The amount that you want to take, if it is a stack. (0 for the whole stack)

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.Item.Drop
member.summary: Drops the item as the feet of the player.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.DropItem(System.UInt16@,System.UInt16@,System.Byte@)
member.summary: Drops the item on the ground at the specified point.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.DropItem(UOLite2.LiteClient.Serial@)
member.summary: Drops the item into the specified container.

member.name: M:UOLite2.LiteClient.DropItem
member.summary: Drops the item in the players hand into the player's backpack.
